name: The House (itch) (Sd_Studios)
description:
Horror fps game that is under development. You are in a house, but not a regular house, but a strange house where the creepy and interesting stuff happens. You should investigate The House and get every item you might need for later.

New update: alpha 2.0

patch notes:

some bug fixes

new room to explore

As a celebration, we made it free till alpha 2.5

If you tried the game out you can leave a review. 

System requirements:

minimum:                                      recommended:

 for 60fps on ultra                        for 60 fps on ultra in future updates

Gtx 1050ti or better                     Gtx 1650 super or better

intel core i3 3220 or better          i5-6600k or better 

8GB of ram                                   14GB of ram

4GB available space                    10 GB of available space 

Bare minimum(medium to lowest graphics on 60fps)

GT 1030 or better 

Intel core2 duo p8400 or better 

6GB of ram 

2GB available space
